title: Le Couffin Bio
description: Health food and grocery market. Carries a large selection of vegan, raw, and vegetarian ready-to-go foods and desserts. Sells vegan ready made sandwiches, salads, entrees, soups, desserts, pastries and more. Also has an abundance of vegan, vegetarian, and gluten free grocery items from cereals, to chips, to frozen foods/meals, to vegan protein powders and dietary supplements, in addition to organic produce.
